languages.text: {n}Дама в золотой маске деликатно прокашливается:{/n} "Мы не говорим ни слова неправды. Эта пародия на благородного мужа получила привилегии меньше сотни лет назад. Семья выскочек, возвысившихся на торговле. Для прирожденных дворян это все равно что переодетая чернь".

{n}The lady in the golden mask clears her throat:{/n} "There is not a word of a lie in what we have said. This travesty of a nobleman was granted his privileges less than a hundred years ago — a family of upstarts who have elevated themselves through peddlery. For any trueborn noble, he is no different from a masquerading peasant."
languages.original_text: {n}Дама в золотой маске деликатно прокашливается:{/n} "Мы не говорим ни слова неправды. Эта пародия на благородного мужа получила привилегии меньше сотни лет назад. Семья выскочек, возвысившихся на торговле. Для прирожденных дворян это все равно что переодетая чернь".

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman in the golden mask clears her throat:{/n} "There is not a word of lies in what we have said. This travesty of a nobleman was granted his privileges less than a hundred years ago. A family of upstarts who have elevated themselves through peddlery. For any born noble, he is no different from a masquerading peasant."

A family of upstarts who have elevated themselves through peddlery. For any born noble, he is no different from a masquerading peasant."

This travesty of a nobleman was granted his privileges less than a hundred years ago — a family of upstarts who have elevated themselves through peddlery. {n}The lady in the golden mask clears her throat:{/n} "There is not a word of a lie in what we have said. This travesty of a nobleman was granted his privileges less than a hundred years ago — a family of upstarts who have elevated themselves through peddlery. For any trueborn noble, he is no different from a masquerading peasant."

languages.text: {n}戴着金色面具的女士清了清嗓子。{/n}“我们刚刚说的话，没有一句谎言。这个人是不到一百年前才成为贵族的，他的身份是在嘲弄所有真正的贵族。他不过是个暴发户，靠着耍嘴皮子做买卖，才得到了如今的地位。对任何一位真正的贵族而言，他都与戴着面具的农奴无异。”
languages.original_text: {n}The lady in the golden mask clears her throat:{/n} "There is not a word of a lie in what we have said. This travesty of a nobleman was granted his privileges less than a hundred years ago — a family of upstarts who have elevated themselves through peddlery. For any trueborn noble, he is no different from a masquerading peasant."

traits.locale_text: {n}戴着金色面具的女士清了清嗓子。{/n}“我们刚刚说的话，没有一句谎言。这个人是不到一百年前才成为贵族的，他的身份是在嘲弄所有真正的贵族。他不过是个暴发户，靠着耍嘴皮子做买卖，才得到了如今的地位。对任何一位真正的贵族而言，他都与戴着面具的农奴无异。”

languages.text: {n}黄金の仮面をつけた女性は咳払いした。{/n}「私たちの言葉には、一片の偽りもございません。この見せかけの貴族が特権を授かったのは、ほんの百年にも満たぬ昔のこと。商売まがいでのし上がった成り上がりの一族です。本物の貴族の目には、彼など変装した農民と何ら変わりはございません」
languages.original_text: {n}The lady in the golden mask clears her throat:{/n} "There is not a word of a lie in what we have said. This travesty of a nobleman was granted his privileges less than a hundred years ago — a family of upstarts who have elevated themselves through peddlery. For any trueborn noble, he is no different from a masquerading peasant."

traits.locale_text: {n}黄金の仮面をつけた女性は咳払いした。{/n}「私たちの言葉には、一片の偽りもございません。この見せかけの貴族が特権を授かったのは、ほんの百年にも満たぬ昔のこと。商売まがいでのし上がった成り上がりの一族です。本物の貴族の目には、彼など変装した農民と何ら変わりはございません」

languages.text: {n}La mujer de la máscara dorada se aclara la garganta:{/n} «No hemos dicho más que la pura verdad. Este remedo de noble recibió sus privilegios hace menos de un centenar de años; proviene de una familia de advenedizos que se ganan la vida como buhoneros. Para cualquier noble legítimo es poco más que un campesino disfrazado».
languages.original_text: {n}The lady in the golden mask clears her throat:{/n} "There is not a word of a lie in what we have said. This travesty of a nobleman was granted his privileges less than a hundred years ago — a family of upstarts who have elevated themselves through peddlery. For any trueborn noble, he is no different from a masquerading peasant."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mujer de la máscara dorada se aclara la garganta:{/n} «No hemos dicho más que la pura verdad. Este remedo de noble recibió sus privilegios hace menos de un centenar de años; proviene de una familia de advenedizos que se ganan la vida como buhoneros. Para cualquier noble legítimo es poco más que un campesino disfrazado».

languages.text: {n}Altın maskeli kadın, boğazını temizliyor.{/n} "Yalan söylemiyoruz. Bu soylu müsveddesine ayrıcalıkları yüz yıldan kısa bir süre önce verildi. Seyyar satıcılıkla yükselmiş, sonradan görme bir aileden geliyor. Doğuştan soyluların gözündeyse kılık değiştirmiş bir köylüden farkı yok."
languages.original_text: {n}The lady in the golden mask clears her throat:{/n} "There is not a word of a lie in what we have said. This travesty of a nobleman was granted his privileges less than a hundred years ago — a family of upstarts who have elevated themselves through peddlery. For any trueborn noble, he is no different from a masquerading peasant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Altın maskeli kadın, boğazını temizliyor.{/n} "Yalan söylemiyoruz. Bu soylu müsveddesine ayrıcalıkları yüz yıldan kısa bir süre önce verildi. Seyyar satıcılıkla yükselmiş, sonradan görme bir aileden geliyor. Doğuştan soyluların gözündeyse kılık değiştirmiş bir köylüden farkı yok."

languages.text: {n}La dame au masque doré s'éclaircit la gorge :{/n} « Nous n'avons pas proféré le moindre mensonge. Cela fait moins de cent ans que ce faux noble a reçu ses privilèges. Il est issu d'une famille de parvenus élevée à ce rang par ses succès dans le commerce le plus vulgaire. Aux yeux de toute personne de haute naissance, il ne diffère en rien d'un paysan mal grimé. »
languages.original_text: {n}The lady in the golden mask clears her throat:{/n} "There is not a word of a lie in what we have said. This travesty of a nobleman was granted his privileges less than a hundred years ago — a family of upstarts who have elevated themselves through peddlery. For any trueborn noble, he is no different from a masquerading peasant."

traits.locale_text: {n}La dame au masque doré s'éclaircit la gorge :{/n} « Nous n'avons pas proféré le moindre mensonge. Cela fait moins de cent ans que ce faux noble a reçu ses privilèges. Il est issu d'une famille de parvenus élevée à ce rang par ses succès dans le commerce le plus vulgaire. Aux yeux de toute personne de haute naissance, il ne diffère en rien d'un paysan mal grimé. »

languages.text: {n}Die Dame mit der Goldmaske räuspert sich.{/n} "Kein Wort von dem, was wir gesagt haben, ist gelogen. Diese Karikatur eines Adeligen erhielt ihre Privilegien vor weniger als einhundert Jahren – eine Familie von Emporkömmlingen, die sich durch Hausieren nach oben gearbeitet hat. Für jeden wahren Adeligen unterscheidet er sich in nichts von einem verkleideten Bauern."
languages.original_text: {n}The lady in the golden mask clears her throat:{/n} "There is not a word of a lie in what we have said. This travesty of a nobleman was granted his privileges less than a hundred years ago — a family of upstarts who have elevated themselves through peddlery. For any trueborn noble, he is no different from a masquerading peasant."

Diese Karikatur eines Adeligen erhielt ihre Privilegien vor weniger als einhundert Jahren – eine Familie von Emporkömmlingen, die sich durch Hausieren nach oben gearbeitet hat. Für jeden wahren Adeligen unterscheidet er sich in nichts von einem verkleideten Bauern."
